subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=c|rs=女06}} <!-- Note: 姬 is not its kyūjitai form (Not found in Jōyō Kanji 2010) -->

# [[princess]]
# [[concubine]]
# [[woman]]

subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja}} {{wp|Hime}}
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ひめ}} {{IPAfont|⟨pi1 me1⟩}} → *{{IPAchar|/pʲimʷe/}} → {{IPAchar|/fime/}} → {{IPAchar|/hime/}} From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=ひめ|-}}. Originally a compound of {{compound|ja|sort=ひめ|日|tr1=hi|t1=[[sun]]|pos1=a prefix or appellation used in reference to the imperial family|女|tr2=me|t2=[[woman]]}}.{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}{{R:Daijirin}}

Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|き|yomi=o}}
From {{der|ja|ltc|sort=き|-}} {{ltc-l|姬|id=1}}. <!-- Note: jɨ (id=1), not kɨ (id=2), second reading is a surname. -->
